name: Royal Romances: The Power of Chosen One Collector's Edition
name_original: Royal Romances: The Power of Chosen One Collector's Edition
description:
The long-awaited continuation of the most romantic series of drama visual novel "Royal Romances"! Ida is ever closer to her goals, and the final battle is coming… Can you deal with it all? The situation may seem grim, but there is hope on the horizon. There is a prophecy of a Chosen One that will be able to command the dragons once they return. That’s why Ida is kidnapping people: she wants to know who the mystery hero is. She took Glissando, but failed while trying to kidnap Princess Amelia… who might just be the real Chosen One. But beware: the witch won’t give up so easily. There is also the matter of King Illeon preparing a final assault on the forest, and he has a story of his own, too. See all there is to uncover in this magical world and be the force to tip the scale of fate! Gather all your logic and intelligence and become a true hero of this Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

💋 Your own choices!
You have the opportunity to influence the plot of the adventure and your choices matter! Make a fateful decision, on which the development of the romance story narration depends. Can you help the characters and save not only lives but the whole kingdom’s existence before it’s too late? Better think twice!

💋 A variety of achievements!
Unique brain teasers, intricate puzzles and relaxing inventory management mini-games are waiting for you! Explore story rich picturesque locations for hidden objects, search and find mysteries and secrets to earn achievements and highlight your success in the fantasy world of romance!

💋 Bonus materials!
Enjoy fantasy-themed exclusive content! Help the guardians of the forest prevail against the forces of darkness! Even the ancient shepherds of the forest sometimes can be emotional and need a hand. Find out what the Great Ent can’t handle alone!

💋 Collectible items!
Explore the enchanting locations of the magic world keeping an eye out for exciting collector’s items and objects! Search the fantasy forest for hidden treasures and solve magical brain teasers to collect peculiar things!
